iree_add_all_subdirs()

# iree::hal::drivers dependency requires threading
# TODO(#4298): Separate HAL driver registration from threading.
if(NOT ${IREE_ENABLE_THREADING})
  return()
endif()

iree_cc_library(
  NAME
    runtime
  HDRS
    "api.h"
  DEPS
    ::impl
    iree::base
  PUBLIC
)

iree_cc_library(
  NAME
    impl
  HDRS
    "call.h"
    "instance.h"
    "session.h"
  SRCS
    "call.c"
    "instance.c"
    "session.c"
  DEPS
    iree::base
    iree::base::core_headers
    iree::base::internal
    iree::base::internal::file_io
    iree::base::tracing

    iree::hal::drivers
    iree::modules::hal
    iree::vm
    iree::vm::bytecode_module
  PUBLIC
)
